verses.roman:
tabe cali' āilā prabhu 'sumanaḥ-sarovara'
tāhāṅ 'govardhana' dekhi' ha-ilā vihvala

synonyms: tabe—thereafter; cali'-traveling; āilā—came; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sumanaḥ-sarovara—to the lake known as Sumanaḥ; tāhāṅ—there; govardhana—Govardhana Hill; dekhi'-seeing; ha-ilā vihvala—became overwhelmed.
translation: From Rādhā-kuṇḍa, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu went to Sumanaḥ Lake. When He saw Govardhana Hill from there, He was overwhelmed by joy.
